task_name: Manual testing guide for outcome feature
enables_user_action: QA testers can follow a structured manual checklist to validate all outcome scenarios—create, edit, recover drafts, handle failures, and confirm responsive UI—before release.

implementation.approach: Authored a comprehensive manual QA guide aligned with quickstart scenarios, adding environment setup, eight core flows, performance checks, and result logging instructions.

test.approach: Documentation-only task; no automated tests executed.

next_steps: Execute manual scenarios prior to release and log findings.
Coordinate with QA to update tracker once validations pass.
